sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button class="btn btn-sm btn-primary mx-2" @click="editDetail(subId)">
    แก้ไขข้อมูล
  </button>
  <button class="btn btn-sm btn-danger mx-2" @click="delDetail(subId)">
    ลบข้อมูล
  </button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "SubjDel",
  props: ["subId"],
  data() {
    return {};
  },
  methods: {
    editDetail(theId) {
      this.$emit("edit", theID);
    },
    delDetail(theId) {
            fetch('http://localhost:3000/course/' + theId, {
                method: 'DELETE'
            })
            .then(() => {

            })
            .catch(err => console.log(err.message))
        }
  },
};
</script>

<style>
</style>
